issue.title: [C++] Add multithreaded JSON reader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4708](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4708). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The JSON reader currently only parses from a single, contiguous buffer and only in a single thread. This would be much more useful if it supported multithreaded parsing from a stream, as CSV does
